approveTrove(address).details: to approve trove, and let it liquidate itself further

claimCollateralAndDebt(uint256,uint256).details: to transfer collateral and decrease collateral and debt in the pool

params._unclaimedCollateral: unclaimed collateral calculated in the trove
params._unclaimedDebt: the unclaimed debt calculated in the trove

liquidate().details: liquidates the trove that called it

unapproveTrove(address).details: to unapprove trove, forbid it to liquidate itself further

devdoc.title: is used in case when stabilityPool is empty or not enough to liquidate trove
